primary.name: Midnight Navy
primary.description: The anchor color. Conveys intelligence, trust, and authority. Use for backgrounds, headers, and primary UI elements.

accent.name: Electric Cyan
accent.description: The cutting-edge accent. Conveys innovation, technology, and energy. Use for CTAs, highlights, interactive elements, and brand moments.

highlight.name: Ember Gold
highlight.description: The warm highlight. Conveys creativity, enlightenment, and human connection. Use sparingly for emphasis, awards, premium features.

neutral.name: Slate
neutral.description: The structural palette. Use for text, borders, backgrounds, and UI chrome.
